Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Proteinuria is an expected complication in transplant patients treated with mammalian target of rapamycin inhibitors ( mTOR - i ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Proteinuria |
| Complication in transplant patients |
| (Expected complication in) transplant patients treated with mammalian target of rapamycin inhibitors (mTOR-i) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Proteinuria |
| (Expected complication in) proteinuria in transplant patients treated with mammalian target of rapamycin inhibitors (mTOR-i) |

Explanation:

1. Proteinuria is a clear disease entity.
2. "Complication in transplant patients" is not a specific disease, but rather a description of a situation where a disease (proteinuria) occurs. Therefore, we include the phrase "in transplant patients" as part of the description of proteinuria.
3. "Transplant patients treated with mammalian target of rapamycin inhibitors (mTOR-i)" is not a disease, but rather a description of a population of patients who are at risk for developing proteinuria. Therefore, we include this information as part of the description of proteinuria as an "expected complication in proteinuria in transplant patients treated with mTOR-i".
